mapper.select: SELECT st.id serve_type_id, st.NAME serve_type_name, si.id serve_item_id, si.NAME serve_item_name, s.update_time, s.sale_status, si.reference_price, s.create_time, s.region_id, s.price, s.id, s.is_hot FROM serve s INNER JOIN serve_item si ON s.serve_item_id = si.id INNER JOIN serve_type st ON si.serve_type_id = st.id WHERE region_id = #{regionId}
